summary: Ramazan ayı için 30 günün tek tek işaretlenebildiği bir oruç takip sistemi geliştirme projesi

existing_features.title: Add a dedicated "Ramadan (30 days)" tracking section to the existing Fasting Tracker tab that lets the user mark/unmark each of 30 days as completed, shows progress (e.g., X/30), and provides a one-tap reset/clear action for the Ramadan checklist.
Persist the Ramadan 30-day checklist state in local settings so it remains after reload, and implement a forward-compatible localStorage migration for the new settings fields.

Ensure the Ramadan checklist UI is mobile-friendly and consistent with the app’s existing warm theme (cards, badges, separators), including a compact layout (e.g., responsive grid or list) suitable for 30 items.

new_feature_requests.summary: Ramazan ayında 30 günün tek tek işaretlenebildiği oruç takip sistemi oluştur

projectName: Add a 30-day Ramadan fasting checklist to the Fasting Tracker
